name: robinson-crusoe
description: A lonely minimalist framework with purpose and meaning for seeing OOP as two separate devices, one a chain of functions (constructors with super calls) and another as a set of functions that build up a single object (methods).

scripts.save: git add .; git commit -m 'New Release'; git push; npm version patch; npm publish; git push;

author: fantasyui.com <fantasyui.com@gmail.com>
